articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Namhung Youth Chemical Complex
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Namhung Youth Chemical Complex
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex. 
					 First he went round the newly built functional threefold greenhouse plastic sheet production process at the high pressure polyethylene shop.
					
					 After being briefed on it before a map showing production processes, he went round the said process.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the complex have built a modern production process capable of mass-producing those sheets 0.06-0.12mm in thickness and 8-12m in width.
					
					 He underscored the need not only to accumulate a wealth of experience but control equipment in a responsible manner as the complex is the first to produce such sheets and, at the same time, steadily raise the workers' technical skills to keep production going at a high rate and improve their quality.
					
					 Then he moved to the fertilizer forwarding shop to learn about the fertilizer production.
					
					 Watching fertilizers highly piled up at the shop, he said they look like heaps of rice bags. The complex providing fertilizers to agriculture is like an arsenal for the socialist agricultural front, he noted.
					
					  Seeing the process in which fertilizers are put into plastic bags, products of coal gasification, he was very pleased, saying the complex is an enterprise where independence and Juche character have been fully established as fertilizers are produced by full use of anthracite abundant in the country.
					
					 After learning about issues arising in increasing fertilizer production, he showed such deep loving care as personally settling a knotty problem.
					
					 He made the rounds of the animal shed and the Chongchun Health Complex to learn in detail about supply service and the cultural and emotional life of the workers.
					
					 At the animal shed, he praised the complex for greatly contributing to improving the diet of the workers by raising domestic animals in a big way.
					
					 He highly praised Jon Kyong Son, chief secretary of the complex party committee, for his successful supply service to the employees before having a photo taken with him.
					
					 At the Chongchun Health Complex, he was pleased with the fact that the complex is providing the workers with ample conditions for cultural rest.
					
					 He set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by the complex.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song and Kim Yong Nam, secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Vegetable Greenhouses
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Vegetable Greenhouses 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited vegetable green houses on the Songhak Co-op Farm in Anju City, South Phyongan Province. 
					 He went round several greenhouses to learn about their construction and production there. 
					
					 He asked what kinds of vegetables they cultivate at present, how they ensure heating in winter, how do they ventilate in summer and what quantities of vegetables they produce in a year. 
					
					 It is gratifying that the Songhak Co-op Farm built the vegetable green houses with large production capacity by itself, produces various kinds of vegetables and supplies them to the farmers, he said. 
					
					 He said he was pleased to learn that the farm built greenhouses by using locally available materials to suit the actual conditions of rural areas. He called on the farm to operate the greenhouses well so that its members may substantially benefit from them. 
					
					 He said that to build vegetable greenhouses in various places and effectively operate them is very important for overcoming seasonal limitation in vegetable production and providing the people with fresh vegetables all the year round. 
					
					  He stressed the need for a national institution to provide a standardized design for greenhouses to be built in provinces, cities and counties, organize contests among them and take measures for summing up them.
					
					 It is necessary to boost the per-area yield of vegetables at greenhouses, he noted, underlining the need to build greenhouses to suit the local climatic and topographical conditions and put the production on a scientific and technological basis.
					
					 He said that there should be good conditions including temperature, humidity, light and soil suitable for the nature of vegetables in greenhouse cultivation and a high yield can be expected when vegetables are distributed in greenhouses to suit the biological characteristics.
					
					 He stressed the need for the Pyongyang Vegetable Science Research Institute to work out a scientific and technological guidebook to distribute it to all greenhouses and called on them to put vegetable cultivation on a scientific basis.
					
					 If a greenhouse is to cultivate several kinds of vegetables a year, it is necessary to sufficiently apply chemical fertilizers along with organic compost, he said, underlining the need to establish a state work system for supplying agricultural chemicals, fertilizers and seeds to the greenhouses.
					
					 "There will be no problem in the construction of vegetable greenhouses if vinyl sheet is mass-produced at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex", he added. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that all fields and units would deeply understand the significance and importance of building vegetable greenhouses and make a positive contribution to successfully carrying out the WPK's policy on ensuring abundant diet of the people.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Pak Thae Song and Kim Yong Nam, secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Chinese President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, Tuesday.
					 Xi Jinping in the message expressed deep gratitude to Kim Jong Un for sending congratulations on his 60th birthday.
					
					 In the message he said he sets best store by the development of China-DPRK relations.
					
					 The party and the government of China attach importance to China-DPRK friendship and keep it as their policy to maintain the bilateral relations on a strategic height and from the long-term viewpoint, the message said, adding that they, together with the party and the government of the DPRK, would respect, trust and cooperate with each other from the friendly stand in line with the policy of inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, building good neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation and thus promote the sound and stable development of the bilateral relations and defend the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula by joint efforts.
					
					 The message wholeheartedly wished the fraternal Korean people bigger successes in accomplishing the cause of building Korean-style thriving socialist nation under the leadership of the WPK with Kim Jong Un as its first secretary.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and success in his work and his family happiness.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Visits Mushroom Research Institute under State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Visits Mushroom Research Institute under State Academy of Sciences 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army (KPA), made a field survey of the Mushroom Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences. 
					 The Turf Institute of the State Academy of Sciences was built as required by the new century thanks to the great benevolence of Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un. The Mushroom Research Institute is planned to be remodeled to be conducive to improving diet of service personnel and people. 
					
					 Referring to the warm loving care and deep trust of the Supreme Commander in the scientists, Choe Ryong Hae learned in detail with officials concerned about the direction of remodeling the institute. 
					
					 He said that now service personnel of the KPA work miracles and innovations in the main fields of building a thriving nation by creating "Masikryong Speed" true to the appeal of the Supreme Commander. He called for hastening the construction and ensuring highest quality in the same spirit and stamina as displayed by soldiers. 
					
					 He discussed matters arising in successfully pushing ahead with the project and took measures.

articles.title: DPRK-China Strategic Dialogue in Diplomatic Field Held
articles.content:
DPRK-China Strategic Dialogue in Diplomatic Field Held
 Beijing, June 19 (KCNA) -- Strategic dialogue between the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China was held in Beijing on Wednesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and his party and Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and from the Chinese side were Zhang Yesui, permanent vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
					
					 Both sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 The dialogue took place in a comradely and friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Ministry of People's Security Vows to Punish Defectors Keen on Escalating Confrontation
articles.content:
Ministry of People's Security Vows to Punish Defectors Keen on Escalating Confrontation
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK issued the following special statement Wednesday:
					 The DPRK, a country dignified with independence and powerful with Songun, is enjoying the greatest dignity with a bright prospect of socialism of Juche.
					
					 The world is looking enviously at the army and people of the DPRK dashing ahead toward the final victory in sight on the horizon at the "Masikryong Speed". Meanwhile, the moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK on the part of the dishonest and hostile forces have faced bankruptcy.
					
					 A handful of human scum is moving desperately to deter this progress.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and other present puppet authorities of south Korea are openly putting to the fore human scum belonging to the organizations of die-hard defectors from the north, painting them as "experts in north Korean issue" and instigating stepped-up criticism.
					
					 On June 18, south Korea fed to Yonhap News and The Washington Post articles contributed by defectors saying that copies of book "My Struggle" authored by Hitler were presented to officials in the DPRK as gifts and campaign is now under way to learn from the experiences gained in rebuilding the "Third Empire" that existed in Germany after the First World War. 
					
					 They even committed the thrice-cursed crime of belittling the matchless great personality of the leader of the DPRK reflected in his loving care for the future generations.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK regard it as shame to make mention of defectors from the north, a group of wild dogs in human form.
					
					 The group of human scum marginalized in the bright world has become the main player in the confrontation farce under the patronage of the south Korean puppet group and brigandish U.S. imperialists. They even slandered and insulted the dignity and the social system of the DPRK, an act which can neither be overlooked nor tolerated.
					
					 By origin, defectors are human scum who were deserted even by home folks and kinsmen being branded as elements subject to legal punishment in the clean society in the DPRK for their crimes of murder, robbery, pilferage, embezzlement of state properties and corruptions.
					
					 South Koreans also know this.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities try to escalate confrontation with the DPRK by using them and the U.S. seeks to overthrow the social system in the DPRK in reliance on them. This proves the poor plight of the Park Geun Hye regime and the U.S. politics.
					
					 It is none other than the present puppet authorities of south Korea which seek to fan up confrontation wind despite their loud-mouthed ballad for "confidence" and "dialogue". And it is the U.S. which moves overtly and covertly to topple the social system in the DPRK despite its stereo-typed call for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 No matter how desperately the puppet group of south Korea may try being gripped in extreme uneasiness and horror, they can never prolong their dirty remaining days. The U.S. which tries to attain its aggression aim in reliance on the group is bound to face bankruptcy in its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The National Defence Commission of the DPRK on June 16 warned that all the future developments depend on the U.S. responsible option.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are strongly calling for punishing those human scum as early as possible as they are going hysteric as servants escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, far from trying to redress their crime-woven past with death.
					
					 There are daily requests from home folks and kinsmen of those defectors asking to let them kill human scum with their own hands.
					
					 The Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK, reflecting the grudge of all its service personnel and people, is determined to take substantial measures to physically remove despicable human scum who are committing treasons at the instigation of the south Korean puppet authorities and the gangster-like U.S.
					
					 Sordid human scum will never be able to look up to the sky nor be able to find an inch of land to be buried after their death.
					
					  The U.S. and the south Korean authorities and wicked conservative media resorting to smear campaign against the DPRK in reliance on them will be made to meet merciless punishment of justice.

articles.title: British Ambassador Hosts Reception
articles.content:
British Ambassador Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Michael John Gifford, British ambassador to the DPRK, Wednesday hosted a reception to celebrate the official birthday of the queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, its national day.
					 Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, O Ryong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Mun Jae Chol, vice-director of the General Bureau of Diplomatic Corps Affairs, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth, Students Held
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in different parts of the DPRK on Wednesday, the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The plazas of the Monument to Party Founding, the April 25 House of Culture and the Arch of Triumph and other venues of dancing parties here were crowded with youth and students.
					
					 Dancing parties started with song "Glory to Our Great Party".
					
					 The participants danced, recollecting with deep emotion the undying feats Kim Jong Il performed by greatly contributing to the development of the WPK.
					
					 Festive atmosphere picked up when songs "Ongheya" and "This Is Offensive Battle" were played. 
					
					 Similar events took place in all provincial seats on the day.

articles.title: Performance Given by Mansudae Art Troupe
articles.content:
Performance Given by Mansudae Art Troupe
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- An art performance "We'll Travel One Road Forever" was given by the Mansudae Art Troupe at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Wednesday, the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Among the audience were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party and the state, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and Pyongyangites.
					
					 The performance began with piano solo and chorus of famous masterpiece "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee". Put on the stage were female solo and chorus "You Are Mother", mixed quintet and chorus "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", dance "Higher and Faster, Holding Red Flag" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers highly praised the undying feats of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, who demonstrated before the world the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea and opened a new history of prosperity on this land by leading the WPK to a brilliant victory.

articles.title: Performance Given by Art Squad of Youth League
articles.content:
Performance Given by Art Squad of Youth League
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the Art Squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding on Wednesday, the 49th anniversary of General Scretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Put on the stage were small chorus "Long Live the Workers' Party of Korea", mixed quartet and pangchang "Party Is Care of the General", male solo and pangchang "The Voice of the Mother", poem-reciting and story-telling "We Have the Mother" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers highly lauded the revolutionary feats Kim Jong Il performed by making undying contributions to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche by leading the WPK to one victory after another with his extraordinary wisdom, distinguished leadership ability and noble traits.
					
					 Among the audience were officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Performance Given by Members of Art Group of Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Performance Given by Members of Art Group of Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by members of the art group of the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Wednesday, the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Put on the stage were chorus "Let's Sing of June 19", xylophone playing and song "I Answered Question of My Younger Sister", duet "Always by My Side" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the feats Kim Jong Il performed by developing the WPK into the mother party serving the people and bringing a rosy future to the younger generation.
					
					 Their repertoire included female chorus "Our Grateful Sun" and dialogic poem "Promise Reflective of Loving Care" truthfully representing the happy life of schoolchildren who are stoutly growing to be the masters of the future under the loving care of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: New Posters Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
Posters Produced in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Posters encouraging service personnel and people in their drive to successfully carry out the new line of the Workers' Party of Korea on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and effect a great surge in building a thriving socialist nation and improving the standard of people's living were produced in the DPRK.
					 Posters "Toward Implementing Line on Simultaneously Pushing Forward Economic Construction and Building of Nuclear Force!", "Let Us Thoroughly Implement the Party's Line on Simultaneously Pushing Forward Economic Construction and Building of Nuclear Force!" and "Are You Dedicating Yourselves to the Implementation of the Party's Line on Simultaneously Pushing Forward Economic Construction and Building of Nuclear Force?" reflect the fixed pledge of all service personnel and people to successfully carry out the strategic line.
					
					 Among the posters are "Light Industry and Agriculture Are Main Thrusts of Building Economic Power!" and "Toward World Advanced Level!" which call for bringing about a change in improving the standard of people's living by making a great leap forward and signal innovations in agriculture and light industrial sector, the main thrusts of economic construction this year.
					
					 Poster "Let Us Greet with Great Festivals of Victors!" underlines the need to grandly celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as the great festivals of victors to go down in the history of the country.
					
					 Posters "Merciless Blows at Enemies!" and "Once Order Is Issued, Blow up Bases of Aggression at One Go!" reflect the spirit of the army and people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemies. Poster "Let Us Run and Run for the People!" calls for dynamically advancing along the road of patriotism and devotion, true to the noble intention of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Athletes Prove Successful at Int'l Tournaments
articles.content:
DPRK Athletes Prove Successful at Int'l Tournaments
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Athletes of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have made good results at international tournaments.
					 Kim Hyon Gyong and Jong Myong Suk won gold medals in the women's 44 kg and 51kg freestyle events respectively at the 2013 Asian Young Wrestling Championship held in Phuket, Thailand some days ago.
					
					 Kim Hyok Bong and Kim Jong came first in the mixed doubles of the 52nd ITTF World Championships (individual events).
					
					 Yang Kyong Il placed first in the men's 55 kg freestyle event at an international wrestling tournament held in Bulgaria, bringing the first gold medal to the country for this year.
					
					 Kim Kum Ok finished first at the 14th Asian Marathon Championship while Ri Se Gwang took the men's vaulting horse title at the 6th Competition for the Cup for Gymnastic Challengers of the International Gymnastic Federation.
					
					 A total of 11 medals, including gold medals, went to the DPRK at the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					
					 Hong Kuk Hyon placed first in the men's 73kg category at the 2013 Asian Judo Championship and Pak Yong Mi and Hwang Ryong Hak in the women's 48kg freestyle and men's 60kg freestyle respectively at the 2013 Asian Wrestling Championship.
					
					 Jong Kum Hwa and Kim Hye Song bagged gold medals in two-woman etude event at the 8th Asian Acrobatic Gymnastic Championship.
					
					 Ri Ji Ryon and Kim Kum Hyang came first at the 2013 World Short Track Speed Skating Tournament for Development Cup of the International Skating Union (ISU) and Ri Chung Il garnered a gold medal at the International Boxing Tournament named after Konstatin Korotkov.
					
					 The DPRK won trophies, top technical prizes and best player prizes, more than 10 in total, in the first half of the year.
					
					 Such signal achievements have fanned up zeal for sporting activities among the local people.

articles.title: More Rallies Held
articles.content:
More Rallies Held
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Rallies took place in cities and counties to vow to devotedly carry out the important tasks laid down in the historic appeal of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and to heartily respond to the letter sent to the people across the country by those reclaiming the Sepho tableland.
					 Present there were officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms as well as teachers and students of universities and collages in the localities.
					
					 The appeal was conveyed at the rallies.
					
					 Then the letter was read out.
					
					 The speakers called on officials and workers in the fields of electricity and coal industry to perform honorable mission and duty as scouts and pioneers in building a thriving nation by keeping pace with the creators of "Masikryong Speed."
					
					 They called upon the agricultural workers to attain without fail this year's goal of grain production laid down by the party in the working spirit displayed by the soldier-builders of the Masik Pass Skiing Ground.
					
					 They called for continuing focusing efforts on the front of light industry, pilot field in building an economic power, and keeping the light industrial factories in full-capacity operation so as to increase the production of consumer goods.
					
					 They stressed the need to supply materials and equipment needed for skiing ground construction and render material and moral help to servicepersons, thus making tangible contribution to completing the construction within this year.

articles.title: Quadruplets Leave Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
articles.content:
Quadruplets Leave Pyongyang Maternity Hospital
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Quadruplets left the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital on Wednesday.
					 The one-girl and three-boy quadruplets born in December last year were the sixth to be born at the hospital. Their parents reside in Ranam District, Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province.
					
					 At the time of birth, their average body weight was 1.4 kg and they were in critical condition.
					
					 There were over 190 doctors' consultative meetings and over 300 examinations of various kinds during the period of intensive treatment that lasted more than 160 days. Health of babies improved day by day with the combination of medicines and manual treatment. Now they are healthy, each surpassing 5 kg in weight.
					
					 The quadruplets left for the Baby Home in North Hamgyong Province, being blessed by the whole country in which triplets and quadruplets are brought up under the care of the party and the state.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Development of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Development of WPK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 49th anniversary of General Scretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 His start of work brought about a new turn in strengthening the WPK and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. 
					
					 With his extraordinary caliber, distinguished leadership ability and noble popular traits, Kim Jong Il had led the WPK and the Korean revolution always to victory.
					
					 He, through his energetic ideo-theoretical activities, formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and clearly showed how to achieve the single-minded unity of whole society. 
					
					 He authored "On the Fundamentals of Revolutionary Party Building", "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" and many other works to indicate the tasks and ways for developing the WPK into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung, modeling whole society on his idea and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche. They have served as guidelines for the party work to be conducted in line with the idea and intention of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He also advanced the slogan "We Serve the People!" for all the party organizations and officials to remain faithful to the people in order to develop the party into the motherly party.
					
					 True to the President's idea of believing in the people as in Heaven, he pursued the all-embracing politics, the benevolent politics based on love and trust, in all realms of society. This helped the WPK steer the cause of socialism to victory, enjoying the absolute trust of the popular masses.
					
					 The 4th Conference of the WPK in April Juche 101 (2012) decided to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its general secretary forever and glorify his revolutionary life and immortal feats.

articles.title: Horses of Anglo-Norman Breed, Gift to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Horses of Anglo-Norman Breed, Gift to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- In the Central Zoo here there are chestnut horses of Anglo-Norman breed.
					 They are a gift to General Secretary Kim Jong Il, presented by the deputy director of the Shenyang Agricultural Scientific and Technological Development Centre of China in September Juche 90 (2001).
					
					 His grandfather was a war veteran, who fought in the Korean War (June 1950-July 1953) as a member of the Chinese People's Volunteers. The deputy director was told by his grandfather about the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and about the heroic Korean people.
					
					 Out of reverence for Kim Jong Il, he prepared a pair of two-year-old horses of Anglo-Norman breed for a gift to the leader. The horses, native to France, were 1.6 meters and 1.55 meters in height respectively and 400 kg and 350 kg in weight at that time.
					
					 They live for 20-25 years.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Media for Carrying False Report about DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts U.S. Media for Carrying False Report about DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Washington Post recently quoted an article allegedly carried by New Focus, media of human scum in south Korea, as saying that the DPRK presented Hitler's memoir "My Struggle" to its officials and there is possibility of the DPRK mounting a campaign of learning after Hitler, which is sheer fabrication.
					 As known, New Focus is wicked media made up of human scum who fled to south Korea from the DPRK after betraying the nation and which is supported by the south Korean puppet group and ultra-right conservatives. It has carried a whole gamut of false reports slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and distorting the situation of socialism only to be cursed and censured by the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The group of such dirty men talked rubbish packaged in false information, a mockery of media whose basic mission is objectivity, impartiality and neutrality and an intolerable insult to human conscience.
					
					 This foolish act is aimed to tarnish the image of the DPRK and hurt the validity and invincibility of the Songun cause, being frightened by the might of the DPRK that arouses admiration and support from the world with time.
					
					 The U.S. media professing professional journalism carried the false report written by those rubbish betes noires for a few pennies, bringing shame to itself.
					
					 Fabricating false reports, away from elementary human conscience and ethics, and echoing them all disclose ignorance of the situation of the DPRK. It is a hysteric symptom of those who are frightened by the DPRK demonstrating its might as the world's strongest political and ideological power and a nuclear weapons state and making leaping progress to bring prosperity.
					
					 No one will believe such a false report in the bright world of the 21st century.
					
					 The false trumpeting by forces hostile to the DPRK is a serious, politically-motivated provocation against it.
					
					 Just as it is impossible to smear the blue sky dark with dirty writing brush of falsity and machinations, the forces hostile to the DPRK can never undermine the validity of the Songun cause pioneered and led by the peerlessly great men nor can they keep the army and people of the DPRK from dynamically advancing toward victory, true to the new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.

articles.title: Suppression of Reunification Movement Organizations Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on June 14 denouncing the puppet authorities for suppressing reunification movement organizations.
					 The statement recalled that the Seoul High Court on June 13 sentenced Choe Tong Jin, director of the editorial board of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, to the same two years in prison as it did at the first trial.
					
					 The heavy penalties on those who have worked with the love for the nation and the patriotic will for reunification show that the despicable moves of the anti-reunification forces for confrontation with fellow countrymen have already gone beyond tolerance limit, it held.
					
					 It recalled that the minister of Justice shortly ago blared that "now the situation is more dangerous than during the Cold War period and it is necessary to deter the freedom of expression", and the "Saenuri Party" is mulling cracking down on the organizations for the reunification movement by terming them "enemy-benefiting organizations" and "criminal organizations".
					
					 It said that the whirlwind of indiscriminative suppression of those organizations and progressive figures under the present regime is ascribable to the authorities' policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 History proves that violence and suppression can never dampen the desire of the nation for independent reunification, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Papers Call for Bringing Earlier Final Victory of Revolutionary Cause of Juche under Party's Leadership
articles.content:
Papers Call for Bringing Earlier Final Victory of Revolutionary Cause of Juche under Party's Leadership
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Leading papers here Wednesday in editorials dedicated to the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea call for bringing earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the great Party.
					 General Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Il's start of work at the WPK Central Committee was a historic event which provided a new epochal landmark for strengthening the party and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the editorial of Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 He was a peerlessly veteran statesman who led the WPK and the Korean revolution to victory for decades with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom, distinguished leadership ability and noble popular traits.
					
					 It was thanks to his wise leadership that the WPK has strengthened into the revolutionary party in which the ideological system and leadership system of the leader have been firmly established, and the mother party that serves the people after forming a harmonious whole with them. A model of the times was set to carry forward the idea and cause of the leader under the banner of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have demonstrated their might as the invincible army and a great heyday for prosperity ushered in on this land. This is because the Korean people are holding him in high esteem at the head of the party and revolution.
					
					 The WPK is demonstrating its might as the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, holding them in high esteem as the eternal leaders.
					
					 It has strengthened into the mother party serving the people, firmly cementing the harmonious whole of the leader, the party and the masses provided by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is demonstrating its might as the militant party ushering in a new heyday of building a thriving nation by applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 The WPK's cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph as there are experienced and seasoned leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and the army and people firmly united around the party in a monolithic idea and will. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls for achieving the eternal prosperity of the country under the leadership of the party by holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Priority to Ideology
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Priority to Ideology
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday carries a bylined article on the 18th anniversary of General Secreatry Kim Jong Il's work "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism".
					 Socialist society is one which is guided by the socialist idea and is developing with it as a main engine, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 In the whole period of his revolutionary leadership Kim Jong Il brought about a great upswing in the revolution and construction by giving definite precedence to ideological work and giving fullest play to the mental power of all service personnel and people.
					
					 The WPK's mode of revolutionary leadership of giving definite precedence to ideological work before all other work with main emphasis on ideology is being steadily carried forward by the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 To take firm hold on ideology is an important requirement for firmly preparing all the party members and other people to be genuine Kimilsungists-Kimjongilists as required by the new era of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The guiding idea which the Korean people should deeply cherish now is great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. The way of firmly defending and eternally glorifying Korean-style socialism lies in holding high the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Giving priority to ideology provides a sure guarantee for winning the final victory in the fierce show-down with the U.S. and firmly defending Korean-style socialism and it is an important requirement for ushering in a new heyday on all fronts of socialist construction by giving fullest play to the mental power of all service personnel and people.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence Is to Deter War and Ensure Peace: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence Is to Deter War and Ensure Peace: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence serves as a powerful treasured sword for deterring a war and ensuring peace on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The sovereignty of a nation can be guaranteed only by its strong power.
					
					 Recently the U.S. and its satellite forces have entered an extremely reckless phase in their moves of aggression to hinder the independent development of the DPRK and realize their ambition to isolate and stifle it.
					
					 The prevailing situation proves that a reliable deterrence is essential for the DPRK to meet the aggressive challenge of the hostile forces and to protect the peace of the country and the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 Immutable is the new strategic line of the DPRK on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force as long as the U.S.-led hostile forces cling to nuclear war provocation against it.
					
					 The strategic line serves as a banner of national prosperity which makes it possible to build a thriving reunified power on this land and open up its rosy future.
					
					 To achieve national prosperity in reliance on the powerful military force is a just road to the development of the nation.
					
					 Whenever opportunities arose, the U.S. and its allies tried to force the DPRK to unilaterally "dismantle nukes", claiming "there should be no dialogue for the sake of dialogue" but only "dialogue for denuclearization". However, this can never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK can never abandon its nuclear deterrence for self-defence as long as the U.S.-led aggression forces go draconic in their nuclear war provocation against the DPRK, posing nuclear threat to it.

articles.title: Hashimoto's Reckless Remarks on Issue of Sexual Slavery under Fire
articles.content:
Hashimoto's Reckless Remarks on Issue of Sexual Slavery under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Hashimoto, who co-heads the Japan Restoration Party, said that the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army was needed. The United Nations Committee against Torture, taking a serious view of his remarks, urged the Japanese government to refute such an attempt as making a mockery of the victims of the sexual slavery.
					 Hashimoto noted that the 1993 "Kono statement" made ambiguous comment as to whether the comfort women were abducted and traded by the intention of the then Japanese state, blaming it as a major reason that prevents the issue from being solved. He urged the government to clarify whether it assumed forced nature or not.
					
					 Minju Joson in a bylined commentary observes in this regard on Wednesday:
					
					 Hashimoto's insistence that there are no data to prove the involvement of the state and the army in the sexual slavery is far-fetched sophism to tamper with history.
					
					 He, spinning a wild daydream to evade the responsibility for Japan's past crimes, made such reckless remarks persistently denying those crimes.
					
					 What matters is that there are so many human scum like Hashimoto in the Japanese political quarters.
					
					 To distort and whitewash history is the official stance of the Japanese government and the whole of Japan is veering to the right, keeping to the reactionary road.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries add to their crimes by manipulating the undeniable historical data in their interests.
					
					 What the Japanese reactionaries should clearly understand is that things will never develop as wished by Japan.
					
					 Japan's persistent evasion of the responsibility for the crime will invite all the worst political ruin.
					
					 Japan is well advised to behave properly, well aware that it can not evade the punishment of history.

articles.title: Demonstration for Wage Hike Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Demonstration for Wage Hike Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Members of south Korean youth organizations including the Network of Youngsters Labor Human Rights staged an action in Seoul on June 14 in demand of wage hike.
					 They in a statement recalled that the General Association of Managers turned down the demand of the workers for raising the minimum wage.
					
					 They accused big businessmen of getting hell-bent on accumulating properties by all means and methods though bi-polarization of society has reached a very serious phase.
					
					 Then they staged a demonstration.
					
					 They put up a stubborn struggle, not slackening their fighting will despite the frantic suppression by riot police.
					
					 That day police walked off seven demonstrators on charges of the violation of the "Law on Assembly and Demonstration" and "disturbance of performance of duties."

articles.title: Concert Given in New York to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Concert Given in New York to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A concert was given in New York on June 13 to mark the anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Among the audience were Koreans in the U.S., staff members of the DPRK permanent mission at the UN, diplomats of different countries at the UN and other foreigners.
					
					 It began with orchestral music "Arirang". Put on the stage were small haegum concerto "The Nodul Riverside", vocal solos "Dear Mt. Kumgang" and "The 2 000-ri Amnok River" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The concert ended with orchestral music "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain." 
					
					 The performers vividly represented the desire and will of all Koreans to achieve national reunification without fail under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on June 16 released a commentary demanding the U.S. respond to the DPRK's proposal for dialogue.
					 The commentary recalled that the spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission in a crucial statement on the same day proposed the U.S. to hold high-level talks between the authorities of the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The proposal was made at a time when U.S. and south Korea were resorting to military provocations against the DPRK, the commentary said. This fully proves that it is the DPRK which wants peace, 
					
					 It urged the U.S. not to evade dialogue while claiming the preservation of the UN resolutions but to stop acts of inciting the military tensions with nuclear weapons, lift "sanctions" against the DPRK and respond to its proposal, though belatedly.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Celebrated by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration Celebrated by Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held an event at the Korean Center on June 15, the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, its officials and compatriots were present there. 
					
					 The participants placed floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 Pak said in his speech that the publication of the June 15 joint declaration was a historic event which ended the history of distrust and confrontation that had lasted for more than half a century and opened a new era of national reconciliation, unity, reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					  We have keenly realized that if the June 15 joint declaration, a great programme common to the nation and landmark for reunification, is preserved and implemented, a wide avenue for reunification, peace and prosperity will be paved, but denial of it would bring only distrust, confrontation and war, he said, adding:
					
					 A bright future will be in store for the nation when the historic north-south joint declarations are respected and implemented.  This is the only way of weathering the present great difficulties.
					
					 We fully support the appeal of the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration and will positively contribute to ushering in the second June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 Then compatriots significantly celebrated the anniversary of the joint declaration, singing songs on the themes of national reunification and dancing.

articles.title: U.S. Loses Domination in World: Bulgarian Newspaper
articles.content:
U.S. Loses Domination in World: Bulgarian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- The Bulgarian newspaper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo in its 1-15th issue carried an article titled "Free and proud country with small territory".
					 The paper said:
					
					 Leader of the DPRK Kim Jong Un changed the balance of force in the world.
					
					 Neither former Soviet Union which once emerged victorious nor any other country made such decision as declaring attack on the U.S.
					
					 Kim Jong Un ordered the DPRK troops to be fully prepared to strike any U.S. military bases in the U.S. mainland and the Pacific region and in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. is losing its domination in the world.
					
					 No one can demand a country which is possessed of nuclear weapons do this or that.
					
					 So, the DPRK has become a nuclear weapons state.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Marked in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars, photo exhibition and film shows took place in the Czech Republic, Bangladesh, Romania and Indonesia on June 12 and 13 to mark the 49th anniversary of Generl Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 On display at the photo exhibition hall were photos documenting exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Participants in the film shows watched Korean films on the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said:
					
					 The greatest exploit performed by Kim Jong Il while working at the Central Committee of the WPK is that he strengthened the party organizationally and ideologically and developed it into the party of Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The WPK is invariably advancing along the way of socialism despite any storm and stress. It entirely goes to the credit of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Today the WPK victoriously leads the Korean revolution, upholding the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The WPK will shine as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages and surely accomplish the socialist cause of Korea as long as there is Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A reporter and speakers including the president of the Bangladesh People's League said that Kim Jong Il was the peerlessly elder statesman who led the WPK to ever-victory with the distinguished and matchless political ability. 
					
					 The director of an Indonesian company stressed that Kim Jong Il was the greatest general recognized by the world who was possessed of matchless grit and pluck.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised in Foreign Countries 
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in Mongolia, Indonesia and Germany on June 11 and 12 to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 13th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 Present at the seminars were personages of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, the Mongolian Politics and Business School, the Sinar Perkasa Company of Indonesia, the Nider Sachsen State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany and the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany and masses. 
					
					 D. Olambayar, rector of the Mongolian Politics and Business School, said that it was the greatest exploit of Kim Jong Il that he pursued the Songun politics and defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation. 
					
					 D. Narantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, said that Kim Jong Il led the WPK for nearly half a century, developing it into invincible ranks with the one idea and steel-strong discipline.
					
					 The general director of the Indonesian company said that the DPRK is squarely standing against the U.S. as its army and people are single-mindedly united around the party. 
					
					 The chairman of the Nider Sachsen State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany praised Kim Jong Il for providing the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration the basic idea of which is "By our nation itself". 
					
					 A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in Germany.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Personage of Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Personage of Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, praised General Secretary Kim Jong Il for his exploits.
					 He said in a statement on June 13:
					
					 June 19 marks the 49th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He developed the WPK into an invincible party enjoying absolute support and trust from all the Korean people and established the party's leadership system over socialist construction so as to prevent even the slightest deviation and deflection in carrying out the party's line and policies.
					
					 In the 1990s, in particular, he led the WPK to reliably preserve the revolutionary principle and stand and invariably advance along the road chosen by itself, instilling conviction of victory into the world progressive parties and anti-imperialist independent forces.
					
					 The original Songun politics holds an important position in his political mode.
					
					 The Songun politics firmly guarantees peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the DPRK turned into a political and military power, unperturbed by any military provocation and economic blockade by the imperialists despite world political turmoil.
					
					 The great feats performed by Kim Jong Il in developing the WPK, advancing the socialist cause and defending peace on the Korean Peninsula will always be remembered by the progressives.

articles.title: Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Celebrated in Ecuador
articles.content:
Korean People's War Victory Day to Be Celebrated in Ecuador
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee was inaugurated in Ecuador on June 12 to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Daniel Alvarez Celi, chairman of the Ecuadorian Committee for Supporting Korea's Independent and Peaceful Reunification, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize meeting, lecture, film show, book and photo exhibition and other political and cultural events on the occasion of the anniversary.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Opt for Dialogue with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on June 16 released a commentary demanding the U.S. respond to the DPRK's proposal for dialogue.
					 The commentary recalled that the spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission in a crucial statement on the same day proposed the U.S. to hold high-level talks between the authorities of the DPRK and the U.S.
					
					 The proposal was made at a time when U.S. and south Korea were resorting to military provocations against the DPRK, the commentary said. This fully proves that it is the DPRK which wants peace, 
					
					 It urged the U.S. not to evade dialogue while claiming the preservation of the UN resolutions but to stop acts of inciting the military tensions with nuclear weapons, lift "sanctions" against the DPRK and respond to its proposal, though belatedly.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de unidad 1017 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige ejercicios de unidad 1017 de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito la unidad 1017 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup y dirigio ejercicios de vuelo.
					En el puesto de mando el Mariscal recibio el parte sobre el programa de ejercicios de vuelo.
					
					Viendo los ejercicios de despegue y aterrizaje, el combate aereo y otras acciones, dijo que ellos cumplieron bien ejercicios y poseyeron elevada tecnica de aviacion conforme a la voluntad del partido.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho subrayando que los pilotos de la unidad estan totalmente dispuestos a combatir en cualquier momento.
					
					Senalo que el mismo siempre piensa en los pilotos que defienden fidedignamente el cielo de la patria y encomendo entregarles el alma del Comandante Supremo.
					
					Refirio la necesidad de fortalecer mas los ejercicios de vuelo para que los aviadores preparen estrictamente como combatientes suicida y competentes pilotos capaces de hacer habilmente frente a la guerra moderna.
					
					El Comandante Supremo recorrio el lugar de guardia de combate construido nuevamente y el avion visto por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Dando vuelta al monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion del Dirigente construido en el puesto de mando de la unidad, dijo que deben infundir en los militares las inmortales hazanas del General del Songun conservando bien las fotos del Dirigente y cuidando bien el monumento.
					
					Apunto que los aviadores de la unidad deben hacer bien los preparativos de vuelo para participar en el desfile por el 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					
					Expreso esperanza y conviccion de que los militares de la unidad defenderan con firmeza el cielo de la patria socialista logrando gran salto en el cumplimiento de los preparativos de combate.
					
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Yun Tong Hyon y Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Combinado de Maquinaria 18 de Enero.
					Ante todo, estuvo en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria. 
					
					Viendo atentamente los datos y objetos de interes historico-revolucionario, dijo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il concedieron suma importancia a esta fabrica que desempena papel importante en el desarrollo de maquinaria del pais y que el mismo tambien tiene gran interes en la produccion de ella. 
					
					Informado de que no ha concluido a mas de 2 anos la construccion de la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, dijo que eso deja conocer la causa de la no normalizacion de produccion de esta fabrica. 
					
					El Partido resalta la importancia de anteponer a la produccion la educacion ideologica para elevar el entusiasmo de las masas productoras, sin embargo, el Comite del Partido en esta fabrica no ha aceptado en lo ideologico esa orientacion, reprendio. 
					
					No se que es lo que ven y dirigen los funcionarios del comite del partido en la provincia cuando visitan esta fabrica, se pregunto y alerto sobre el estancado modo de pensar y trabajar de ellos.
					
					Al mirar un rato los cumulos de arenas y gravillas y bloques dispersados en el campo de construccion de la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, dijo que no le alcanzan las palabras para senalar lo desordenado del lugar. 
					
					En la sala de estudio del Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo, subrayo que el Comite Provincial del Partido debe sacar seria leccion tomando en cuenta la orientacion del Partido de priorizar la educacion ideologica y politica. 
					
					Luego, vio los productos mecanicos de diferentes tipos hechos en la fabrica averiguando como se cumple el plan de produccion. 
					
					Recorrio el taller de montaje general, el de elaboracion, el campo de operacion de prueba, la fundicion y otros varios puntos para hacer conocimiento del estado de modernizacion de la fabrica.
					
					Acoto que son caducos los equipos de produccion de la fabrica desde el punto de vista de la era de economia basada en intelectualidad, y que es inferior el nivel de la cultura de produccion y de vida en comparacion con otras fabricas y empresas. 
					
					Al hacer conocimiento detallado de las gestiones de autoabastecimiento, lamento que los funcionarios de la fabrica no atendieran bien las condiciones de vida de los empleados como desea el Partido. 
					
					El Mariscal indico las tareas que incumben a la fabrica:
					
					Hay que glorificar las hazanas de direccion de los grandes Generalisimos. 
					
					Es preciso dinamizar la educacion ideologica para poner de pleno manifiesto el poder espiritual de los obreros.
					
					Deben impulsar constantemente la campana para modernizar y asentar sobre base cientifica los procesos de produccion.
					
					Hace falta mejorar el abastecimiento, mejorar el nivel material y cultural de los trabajadores y esforzarse mucho por establecer la cultura de vida y produccion. 
					
					Aunque son dificiles y enormes las tareas, la fabrica puede cumplirlas sin falta porque cuenta con su clase obrera revolucionaria y el colectivo de tecnicos forjado en la practica y tiene experiencias abundantes y tradiciones orgullosas, expreso el Mariscal.
					
					Manifesto la gran esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros de la fabrica remozaran su empresa de acuerdo con la demanda del siglo nuevo y registraran un auge en la produccion de maquinas modernas para cumplir satisfactoriamente el papel de vanguardia en la materializacion de la politica economica del Partido. 
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Choe Ryong Hae, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon y Han Song Ho.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre Instituto de Hongo de Academia Estatal de Ciencias
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre Instituto de Hongo de Academia Estatal de Ciencias
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, recorrio el Instituto de Hongo de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias. 
					Gracias a la gran benevolencia del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, se ha levantado el Instituto de Cesped de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias conforme a demanda del nuevo siglo y, a continuacion, se reconstruira  excelentemente el Instituto de Hongo, que contribuira a elevar el nivel de la vida alimentaria de los militares y civiles. 
					
					Choe se refirio al gran amor y confianza del Comandante Supremo dispensados a los cientificos e hizo conocimiento de rumbo de reconstruccion del Instituto junto con los funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					Dijo que en acato al llamamiento del Comandante Supremo, el EPC registra milagros e innovaciones en los principales campos de la construccion de un Estado prospero levantando el oleaje de creacion de la "velocidad Masikryong" e insistio en la necesidad de  aumentar la velocidad de construccion y asegurar al maximo su calidad con el espiritu e impetu de los militares. 
					
					Discutio los asuntos que se presentan en la marcha exitosa de la obra y tomo medidas necesarias.

articles.title: MINSEP publica declaracion especial sobre campana anti-RPDC de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
MINSEP publica declaracion especial sobre campana anti-RPDC de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- El Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 19 la siguiente declaracion especial:
					Se eleva al maximo el prestigio de nuestro pais dignificado por la postura independiente y el Songun y prometedor por el socialismo de tipo jucheano. 
					
					Todo el mundo admira la justa lucha de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, que avanzan a galopes a la "velocidad Masikryong" hacia la victoria final en el horizonte, y fracasan las maniobras de las fuerzas hostiles para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC. Esto es tendencia de la epoca actual. 
					
					Un punado de escorias humanas esta desesperado por detener esa corriente impetuosa. 
					
					En estos dias, detras de la cortina de dialogo, Park Geun-hye y otras autoridades titeres surcoreanas lanzan a las escorias humanas pertenecientes a las entidades de connotados fugitivos norcoreanos, disfrazados de "especialistas en asuntos norcoreanos", al frente de la demagogia publica contra la RPDC. 
					
					El 18 de junio, orquestaron la payasada de publicar a traves de Yonhap News y The Washington Post el articulo inventado por los fugitivos norcoreanos, segun el cual en la RPDC se obsequia a los cuadros el libro "Mein Kampf (Mi lucha)", escrito por Hitler, y se libra la campana de aprendizaje de experiencias de la reconstruccion del "III Reich" realizada en Alemania despues de la primera guerra mundial. 
					
					Para colmo, cometen el crimen nunca visto de calumniar y manchar atrevidamente los grandes rasgos del Gran Hombre quien dispensa gran amor a las generaciones venideras. 
					
					Desde el principio, nuestro ejercito y pueblo consideran como verguenza mencionar a los fugitivos norcoreanos que son perros sarnosos disfrazados de hombre. 
					
					Pero, no podemos pasar por alto ni tolerar que tales tipejos, tachados de la lista de seres humanos y marginados del mundo claro, actuen como protagonistas de la farsa conflictiva anti-RPDC y calumnien atrevidamente la dignidad y el sistema de la RPDC bajo el amparo y mando de la banda titere surcoreana y el bandidesco imperialismo norteamericano. 
					
					Los fugitivos norcoreanos son escorias humanas que fueron abandonados por sus coterraneos y consanguineos al ser sancionados por ley en nuestra sociedad por sus maldades como homicidio, robo de propiedades publicas, depravaciones e inmoralidades, etc.
					
					La poblacion surcoreana tambien lo sabe bien. 
					
					No hablaremos mas de la intencion mezquina de la banda de Park Geun-hye de enfrentarse de todos modos con la RPDC ni de la politica miserable de EE.UU. trazada para derrocar el regimen norcoreano utilizando hasta a tales escorias humanas.
					
					El hecho demuestra claramente que las actuales autoridades surcoreanas se desesperan por levantar la oleada conflictiva, mencionando por otra parte a desganas la "confianza" y "dialogo" y que EE.UU. tambien utiliza todos los medios para derrocar el regimen de la RPDC hablando tanto de la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					A pesar de sus ultimos esfuerzos signados de inquietud y temor, los titeres surcoreanos no pueden mantener su vida desafortunada y sera fracasada la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					Por esta razon, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC advirtio el pasado dia 16 que la evolucion de la situacion depende de la opcion responsable de EE.UU. 
					
					Ahora nuestro ejercito y pueblo reclaman fuertemente eliminar lo mas pronto posible a las escorias humanas que arman la farsa histerica anti-RPDC siendo lacayos de los maniacos de confrontacion conflictiva, en lugar de expiar con muerte su antecedente delictivo. 
					
					Hasta los coterraneos y consanguineos de esos tipejos solicitan casi todos los dias que les permitan matar con sus manos a esas chusmas. 
					
					Reflejando la colera de todos los militares y civiles coreanos, el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio ejecutar las medidas practicas para eliminar fisicamente a esos elementos que aumentan sus crimenes de traicion bajo la instigacion de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas y el gangsteril imperio norteamericano. 
					
					Ellos no tendran ni un poco de aire para respirar ni una pulgada de tierra para tener sepultura.
					
					Las actuales autoridades de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y los medios de prensa conservadores tambien sufriran el implacable golpe de justicia.

articles.title: ACNC comenta articulo del medio surcoreano New Focus
articles.content:
ACNC comenta articulo del medio surcoreano New Focus
Pyongyang, 19 de junio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, citando como fuente al medio de prensa surcoreano New Focus, el periodico estadounidense The Washington Post informo un articulo fraudulento de que en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se obsequia a los cuadros el libro biografico de Hitler "Mein Kampf (Mi lucha)", y es posible que el Norte inicie una campana de aprendizaje del fascista aleman.
					Como ya conocido por todos, New Focus es el medio fabricado por las escorias humanas, que se fugaron al Sur de Corea traicionando a la patria, con la ayuda de la banda titere surcoreana y las fuerzas conservadoras ultraderechistas. Es sometido desde hace mucho tiempo a las criticas y denuncias internas y externas por haber inventado muchos articulos que difaman la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y tergiversan la realidad del socialismo.
					
					La demagogia de ese colectivo de conspiradores, disfrazados de periodistas, resulta una burla a la mision original de la prensa que toma por cuestion vital mantener la objetividad, la imparcialidad y la neutralidad.
					
					Ella no pasa de ser una accion estupida para manchar a toda costa la prestigiosa imagen de la RPDC, que provoca la admiracion y el apoyo del mundo, y para desvirtuar la justeza y la invencibilidad de la causa del Songun.
					
					Es una verguenza para el arriba referido rotativo de EE.UU., que se cree influyente, hacerse eco de la desinformacion inventada con fines de lucro por los que dejaron de ser humanos.
					
					De esa manera, se conocio lo histerico que estan los que tienen panico al poderio de la RPDC que marcha a galopes hacia la prosperidad mostrando su gallardo aspecto de primera potencia ideo-politica del mundo y portadora de arma nuclear. 
					
					En el mundo tan claro del siglo 21, nadie creera esos embustes que constituyen una grave provocacion politica a la RPDC.
					
					Los medios intrigantes no pueden desvirtuar de ninguna manera la justeza de la causa del Songun de la RPDC, iniciada y guiada por  los grandes hombres sin iguales, ni impedir el avance victorioso de todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que acatan la nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares.
